answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Understand your predicament.The prognosis for triple valve replacement depends on the ejection fraction, which is the pumping capacity of the heart. If this is good then the outcome of surgery is good. It also depends on other risk factors like diabetes or hypertension.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: my mum is haveing 3 valves replaced she is only 44 but also has lupus
